description:
Bully Kiderra is a mercenary who serves under http://anidb.net/ch89882 [Kan Yu] at Assemble EX-10. Kiderra`s hot temper and lust for violence is offset by http://anidb.net/ch89881 [Potaria]`s steely calm. While extremely gung-ho and rowdy, Kiderra is still loyal to http://anidb.net/ch15676 [Chirico] and the other members of his squad, and is often the first to pilot his http://anidb.net/ch90330 [Diving Beetle] into a good fight.
Source: MAL
name: Bully Kiderra
